mapper.select: SELECT c.room_id roomId, c.member_id memberId, c.message message FROM chat c INNER JOIN ( SELECT room_id, MAX(send_time) last_send_time FROM chat WHERE member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY room_id ) latest_message ON c.room_id = latest_message.room_id AND c.send_time = latest_message.last_send_time ORDER BY c.send_time DESC
SELECT member_id memberId, message, send_time sendTime FROM chat WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY send_time
